  sgcool_label_text: Mrs Sylvia Kho (nee Wong Sien Moy) was a prominent bridal designer in Singapore from the 1950s to 1990s. Beyond wedding gowns
 she also designed dresses for her female relatives.  This mother of the bride dress was designed and made by Sylvia Kho for her seventh sister
 Mrs Florence Chong (nee Wong Chit Moy). It was worn by Mrs Florence Chong at her daughter Colleen’s wedding in July 1973.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: Mrs Sylvia Kho (nee Wong Sien Moy) was a prominent bridal designer in Singapore from the 1950s to 1990s. Beyond wedding gowns, she also designed dresses for her female relatives.  This mother of the bride dress was designed and made by Sylvia Kho for her seventh sister, Mrs Florence Chong (nee Wong Chit Moy). It was worn by Mrs Florence Chong at her daughter Colleen’s wedding in July 1973.
